Comments_List: I learned to analyze economic situations in a macroeconomic level and to understand recent recessions and how to solve them.
Understanding of fundamental macroeconomic concepts and how they apply to recent and historical situations.
Intro macro, solow model, how banks work, understanding of recent recessions
I learned macroeconomic theories and how the government can take action to control the economy.
I gained a broad understanding of macroeconomic events such as banking crises, financial recessions, and unemployment as well as some of the common methods of analyzing these events.
So many things especially about what a country needs to be able to join the first world financially
Strengths: very well organized, all concepts were explained in detail.
I thought it went from largely theoretical to veering sorta graph heavy at the end.
Interesting material, great prof, great application to real life to make it engaging
The lectures were good and there were a lot of resources available.

The strengths of the course have to do with Professor Amand's clear and concise lectures and online meetings. He made the material incredibly interesting by supplementing case studies and other information while taking time to explain the concepts thoroughly.
Yes, it is a great course that covers a lot of material in depth.
Yes. If you need to learn about macroeconomics this is the place to start.
Yes this class is pivotal in economics.
Yes, it is a great way to learn about the macroeconomy in a less hectic manner since it is a summer course, and Professor Amand is great at making the material accessible and interesting!
Yes. It is challenging but very manageable
